name: io.github.HeshamFS/mcp-tool-factory
description: Generate MCP servers from natural language, OpenAPI specs, or database schemas. The factory that builds factories. Requires at least one LLM provider API key.

environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Anthropic Claude API key (one of the 4 provider keys is required)

environmentVariables.name: CLAUDE_CODE_OAUTH_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Claude Code OAuth token (one of the 4 provider keys is required)

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI GPT API key (one of the 4 provider keys is required)

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key (one of the 4 provider keys is required)

tools.name: generate_mcp_server
tools.description: Generate a complete MCP server from a natural language description

tools.name: generate_from_openapi
tools.description: Generate an MCP server from an OpenAPI specification

tools.name: generate_from_database
tools.description: Generate an MCP server with CRUD tools from a database schema

tools.name: validate_typescript
tools.description: Validate TypeScript code for syntax errors

tools.name: list_providers
tools.description: List available LLM providers and their configuration

tools.name: get_factory_info
tools.description: Get information about MCP Tool Factory capabilities
